entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
